transcript.text: good afternoon everyone this is Sydney
aka the bass southern belle and there's
something very interesting that just
popped up in the news recently that I
feel that needs to be discussed because
this is absolutely monumental in terms
of something that the right wing needs
to celebrate and that is that Senator
Ted Cruz actually sent a letter to the
Attorney General and to the director of
the FBI to urge them to investigate an
Tifa as a domestic terrorist
organization which is absolutely
incredible to me that it's taken this
long for someone to address this but but
Ted Cruz actually sent this letter
urging them to address the issues of
domestic terrorism and violence in this
country that is being perpetuated in the
name of social justice and combating
fascism and racism and bigotry and all
these other asinine terms that the left
loves to use against conservatives and
against the right wing in general to
demonize them simply for expressing
political views that they do not agree
with this is incredibly significant for
those of you who have ever attended
rallies or political events as I have
and been subject to instances of
domestic terrorism physical intimidation
violence vandalism or anything else at
the hands of an Tifa black lives matter
and these other terrorist organizations
that love to act in the name of this
radicalized ideology of communism in an
attempt to shut down free speech to
strangle political discourse and the
silence anyone who disagrees with them
so this is quite significant because
it's gotten to the point now where we
have actual governmental officials
acknowledging this as a problem as it
should be because these individuals
claiming to be fighting totalitarianism
fighting fascism and to be standing in
the name of social justice and tolerance
and all these other incredibly ironic
terms that they love to use to describe
their ideology which are not in the
least accurate because they are the most
absolutely hateful people imaginable
this is just incredibly significant
because we've seen so many instances of
hypocrisy on behalf of antia and the far
left to attempt to justify the use of
physical intimidation and violence
against anyone who disagrees with them
and they accomplish this of course by
demonizing anyone who disagrees with
them as a Nazi a bigot a racist of
fascist totalitarian
someone who is intolerant towards others
and yet they engage in such egregious
actions of domestic terrorism and
violence against anyone who disagrees
with them irrespective of what political
ideology they might pertain to it
doesn't matter because anyone who
disagrees with these people will be
demonized by them and could very well be
attacked by them as we so tragically saw
last month when a renowned conservative
under the name of an Dino was viciously
assaulted an attack that ended up in the
hospital with a potential brain bleed as
a result of being assaulted and attacked
by an Tifa now the interesting thing
about this is that an Dino is actually
not only considered a racial minority in
terms of him being Asian but he's also a
homosexual these are two demographics
that the left loves to pretend that they
want to protect and that are being
systematically oppressed by the right
wing under the insistence that the right
wing and that the conservative and the
Republican Party in general are
intolerant towards those particular
people which is of course an absolute
lie the interesting thing is that even
if you pertain to one of those
demographics the left claims to want to
protect they will in fact treat you just
as intolerant and hatefully as possible
if you dare deviate from their political
ideology and frankly it's quite
disgusting to me that an Asian
homosexual was so viciously beaten by
these people upon the basis of a
political disagreement and yet no one is
really calling out this hypocrisy except
for those few who are willing to be
banned for it from social media so this
is just one of many instances and we've
seen this time and time and time again
we saw it in Charlottesville in which
the left instigated a violence and
terrorism against the right wing and
subsequently got off on that violence
without any legal repercussions to their
actions whatsoever we saw it in Portland
last month when the actual mayor
defended the actions of an Tifa we see
it continually when we see these
congresswoman that Trump has been
recently criticizing refused to denounce
not only an Tifa but other branches of
domestic terrorism or foreign terrorism
like al-qaeda or Isis this is a
continual problem on the left that they
not only refused to denounce actions of
domestic terrorism or organizations
committing those actions but overall
facilitate the capacity for these people
to
violently attack anyone who disagrees
with them now of course it doesn't
matter what ideology you pertain to or
what you believe in necessarily but if
you dare have the audacity to disagree
with these people you will inevitably be
called a fascist and demonized as a
racist and bigoted and homophobic
transphobic individual or what other
terms they can throw at you it doesn't
really matter
irrespective of this the fact that this
is being acknowledged by the federal
government is incredibly incredibly
important and I'm very much looking
forward to seeing how this particular
story progresses and of course this is
also why we do what we do in the name of
free speech because we understand that
ultimately we must possess the passion
to defend what we believe in that being
of course the free exchange of ideas
civil discourse political conversations
that should be able to be carried out
and expressed in a way that does not
consist of fear in the fears of being
physically assaulted or subject to
instances of domestic terrorism on
behalf of these people simply for
disagree with them we believe in a free
country and they don't and the
differences they refuse to acknowledge
the rights that we possess inherently as
Americans to live in a free country with
the free exchange of ideas because
accordingly one possesses the right to
disagree with them and we simply can't
have that if they're trying to establish
communism which is precisely the end
game of ante feh and these other leftist
organizations that are pretending to act
in the name of benevolence of social
justice and of equality which is nothing
but a devious lie so we will see how the
story progresses but this is going to be
quite interesting to see how the federal
government tackles this issue and
hopefully indeed we will see something
come of this in the near future
